entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coronation
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
